程序包 org.multiAgent

类 Agent

java.lang.Object
org.multiAgent.Agent
public class Agent extends Object
This class implements value-based transition system(VATS) for an single agent

    • Agent

      public Agent(HashMap<String,Integer> audiences, ArrayList<Argument> arguments, Model model)
      default constructor of agent
      参数:
      audiences - audience of the agent
      arguments - arguments of the agent

  • 方法详细资料

    • initializeByTopic

      public void initializeByTopic(String topic, javafx.util.Pair<ArrayList<Agent>,HashMap<Agent,HashMap<String,Integer>>> dialogueInfo)
      when dialogue is open, generate set of all arguments construct from S under the Goal, and generate IVAF of a single agent
      参数:
      topic - topic select by the dialogue
      dialogueInfo - dialogue information to initialize the model

    • Act

      public Move Act(Messager messager)
      the dialogue trigger the agent to act each round during the deliberation
      参数:
      messager - a messager record all logs during the deliberation
      返回:
      the action an agent choosen

    • updateModel

      public void updateModel(HashMap<Agent,HashMap<String,Float>> possibility)
      the agent will update their model every time when other agent make their move
      参数:
      possibility - a new possibility distribution to update the model

    • protocol

      public HashSet<Move>[] protocol(Messager messager)
      this function returns all moves(agree, assert or close) current available for an agent to take
      参数:
      messager - dialogue log
      返回:
      set of all moves
